casebody.data:
STATE of Indiana, et al., Appellants-Respondents,
v.
Martin FERRELL, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 45A03-1707-MI-1649 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed February 15, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

SHARPNACK , Sr.J. Reversed and remanded. CRONE, J., Concurs.

ALTICE, J., Concurs.
